DOC.brief_summary: Double-blind randomize study compare efficacy two analgesic drug ( Ixprim® , Dafalgan-Codeine® ) emergency unit . The efficacy ( relief pain ) would assess 2 hour administration one two drug patient present emergency unit moderate pain ( 4 6 pain assessment score ) .
DOC.criteria: Patients 18 75 year age Presented emergency unit FOCH hospital Complaining moderate pain ( 46 pain assessment scale ) evaluate reception nurse Patient already receive another type 2 analgesia already receive one study drug last 4 hour pregnant lactate female Patient one contraindication one study drug Patients pain assessment scale perform ( unconscious , confuse ... ) Patient include legal reason Patient require urgent management Patient consider difficult reassess 2 hour later Patient unable swallow
